app.title: Loem Heng - Independence is the clue to the world and owns my life.

home.desc: I embarked on my journey as an IT guy in 2017, and over the years, I have cultivated a strong background in web development, design, data analysis, security, and algorithms. I am fast in collaboration with teamwork, problem-solving, well-organized, focused and detailed task approach to my work. I enjoy exploring new technologies or joining local workshops during my free time.
